title: Show pet hair who's boss with Miele's Cat and Dog Vacuum
description:
How To Keep Your Dog or Cat (and Their Owners) Happy

Ever feel confronted by just too much pet hair? Driven to the brink? Considering doing something extreme? Don't despair: Miele Cat & Dog Vacuum will take care of you AND your pet.

asset.author: Miele USA
asset.description:
How To Keep Your Dog or Cat (and Their Owners) Happy

Ever feel confronted by just too much pet hair? Driven to the brink? Considering doing something extreme? Don't despair: Miele Cat & Dog Vacuum will take care of you AND your pet.

For more information, please go to: http://tinyurl.com/zj39gbf

transcripts: Your dog doesn't like haircuts either. Show pet hair who's boss with Miele's Cat & Dog Vacuum Cleaner. No one will even know you have a pet with the Miele Cat & Dog Vacuum Cleaner. The innovative power nozzle picks up animal hair with ease. Recommended for all flooring types and thanks to its active air clean filter, it's designed with pet owners in mind. The Cat & Dog Vacuum picks up the hair and the odors. Miele - Immer Besser (Forever Better)
